EmailTemplate.description: Used to send GSAP upload report
EmailTemplate.name: Canada GSAP Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Canada SAP upload Data
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi All,
Please click on the below link to check the success/failure of Canada SAP Upload Files records.
Unbranded Upload File https://stasco.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Report/00O4L000002DqDmUAK/view
Branded Upload File https://stasco.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Report/00O4L000002DqDkUAK/view
SFJ Upload File https://stasco.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Report/00O4L000002DqDlUAK/view
Regards, Revolution Canada
